org.apache.beam.sdk.options

Interface PubsubOptions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApplicationNameOptions, GcpOptions, GoogleApiDebugOptions, HasDisplayData, PipelineOptions, StreamingOptions
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockingDataflowPipelineOptions, DataflowPipelineOptions, DataflowWorkerHarnessOptions, TestDataflowPipelineOptions

    public interface PubsubOptions
extends ApplicationNameOptions, GcpOptions, PipelineOptions, StreamingOptions
    Properties that can be set when using Pubsub with the Beam SDK.
